S1.narration: Stanley logs into FriendSpace. The interface looks normal, but a faint glitch hum lingers.

S2.narration: A friend request appears from Clara. Her profile picture flickers slightly.

S3.narration: Suspicious login alerts trigger. Stanley’s account integrity is at risk.

S4.narration: System demands another verification step. The screen glitches harder.

S5.narration: Clara sends a DM: it’s a phishing link disguised as a game invite.

S6.narration: The system stabilizes. Stanley has survived the social engineering attempt.

FailS2.narration: Stanley accepts the request. His account is compromised immediately.

FailS5.narration: Stanley replies. His data is stolen through the phishing exploit.
